org.cryptacular.bean

Class EncodingHashBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cryptacular.bean.EncodingHashBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashBean<String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SaltedHashBean

    public class EncodingHashBean
extends Object
implements HashBean<String>
    Computes a hash in an encoded format, e.g. hex, base64.
    Author:
    Marvin S. Addison

        public boolean compare(byte[] input,
              String hash)
        Compares the hash of the input against a known hash output.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        input - Data to hash.
        hash - Known hash against which to compare.
        Returns:
